Class.Name: CreateModel
Class.PreferredClassName: Creates a new machine learning model
Class.Description: Creates a new untrained machine learning model. All parameters will be initialized to random values.

Parameter.Name: Input neurons
Parameter.Description: The number of input neurons for the model to have.

Parameter.Name: Output neurons
Parameter.Description: The number of output neurons for the model to have.

Parameter.Name: Hidden layers
Parameter.Description: The array of hidden layers to generate.
